ValidationRule.description: If Request Type is not Email Support, you must populate the following fields: Due Date, PGi Bidding, Current Customer, Sales Rep, Oppty Name, NDA in Place, and Is this an Online RFP?
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $Profile.Name <> "System Administrator", ( ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Customer Requested RFP Template') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Proposal') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Request for Information (RFI)') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Request for Proposal (RFP)') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Request for Quote (RFQ) ') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Security Questionnaire') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Vendor Registration') || ISPICKVAL(Request_Type__c,'Vendor Questionnaire') ), ISBLANK ( Due_Date__c )|| ISBLANK ( Opportunity_Name__c)|| ISBLANK ( Sales_Rep_Name__c )||
ISPICKVAL ( PGi_Bidding__c,'')|| ISPICKVAL ( Current_Customer__c ,'')|| ISPICKVAL ( NDA_in_place__c, '')|| ISPICKVAL ( Is_this_an_Online_RFP__c, '') )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The following fields are required and must be populated: Due Date, PGi Bidding, Current Customer, Sales Rep, Oppty Name, NDA in Place, and Is this an Online RFP?
